title.en: Prayer to My Root Guru, Jamyang Loter Wangpo

text.en: All-pervasive sovereign, lord of secrets, Vajra Holder,
Chief of the maṇḍalas of the infinite, ocean-like tantras,
To think of you allays the anxieties of existence and quiescence—
Jamyang Loter Wangpo, to you I pray.
Seeing your form brings the wisdom of great bliss;
text.en-trans: gang ku tongwé dechen yeshe kyé

text.en: Hearing your voice dispels the darkness of ignorance;
text.en-trans: gang sung töpé marik münpa sel

text.en: Recalling your mind reveals the dharmakāya of my own awareness—
text.en-trans: gang tuk drenpé rangrig chökur tön

text.en: Glorious guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Do not neglect me in your compassion,
text.en-trans: khyö kyi tukjé yalwar mi dor shing

text.en: But eradicate the delusion of my three doors
text.en-trans: go sum trulpa tsené chöpa dang

text.en: And cause the wisdom of the three vajras to mature.
text.en-trans: dorjé sum gyi yeshe minpar dzö
